headline: Ethisphere Names Rockwell Automation as One of the 2025 World's Most Ethical Companies(R)
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / March 13, 2025 / Ethisphere, a global leader in defining and advancing the standards of ethical business practices has recognized Rockwell Automation as one of the 2025 World's Most Ethical Companies®. This is the ...

headline: Rockwell Automation Showcases Emulate3D Factory Test for the First Time at NVIDIA GTC 2025
summary: MILWAUKEE, March 13, 2025--Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK), the world’s largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, will debut its new Emulate3D® Factory Test™ capabilities at NVIDIA GTC 2025. This first public showcase will demonstrate how the solution enables factory-scale virtual controls testing, helping manufacturers conduct Factory Acceptance Testing to validate automation systems before deployment.
